name: rize-io-sessions
title: Rize.io Sessions
description: Raycast extension for managing Rize.io sessions (start, stop, extend).
author: sdquinn

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Rize.io API Key
preferences.description: Your Rize.io API key for authentication

commands.name: start-session
commands.title: Start Session
commands.subtitle: Rize.io
commands.description: Quickly start a new Rize session, select session type (Focus, Meeting, Break) and can choose custom duration and an optional description.

commands.name: stop-session
commands.title: Stop Session
commands.subtitle: Rize.io
commands.description: This stops the current Rize session.

commands.name: extend-session
commands.title: Extend Session
commands.subtitle: Rize.io
commands.description: This extends the current Rize session, and you can select from predefined duration options.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
